attrs.description:
Sets whether entity labels will be shown or hidden 

__Default value__: 0 (hidden)
attrs.name: showLabels

attrs.description:
Sets whether entity names will be shown as a part of map labels 

This attribute works only when the `showLabels` attribute is set to __1__.
attrs.name: includeNameInLabels

attrs.description:
Sets whether entity values will be shown as a part of map labels 

This attribute works only when the `showLabels` attribute is set to __1__.
attrs.name: includeValueInLabels

attrs.description:
Sets whether an entity's short name or long name will be a part of the map label 

 __Default value__: 1 (the short name is used in the label) 

This attribute works only when the `showLabels` attribute is set to __1__.
attrs.name: useSNameInLabels

attrs.description:
Sets whether an entity's short name or long name will be a part of the tooltip for an entity 

 __Default value__: 1 (the long name is used in the tooltip) 

This attribute works only when the `showLabels` attribute is set to __1__.
attrs.name: useSNameInToolTip

attrs.description:
Sets whether a shadow effect will be applied to the map 

__Default value__: 0 (the effect is not applied)
attrs.name: showShadow

attrs.description: Sets the map caption
attrs.name: caption

attrs.description: Sets the map sub-caption
attrs.name: subCaption

attrs.range: top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right and top-center
attrs.description:
Sets the caption and sub-caption position 

__Default value__: top-center
attrs.name: captionPosition

attrs.description: The entire map can act as a hotspot. This attribute is used to specify the URL to define the hotspot link for the map. The link can be specified in FusionCharts Link Format.
attrs.name: clickURL

attrs.description: Sets whether the tooltip will shown for entities that don't have a value assigned in the JSON data
attrs.name: hoverOnEmpty

attrs.description: Sets the menu item label for the custom context menu item
attrs.name: aboutMenuItemLabel

attrs.description:
Sets whether entity labels will be shown above or below the markers on a map 

 __Default value__: 1 (the labels appear above the markers)
attrs.name: entityLabelsOnTop

description: These attributes let you control a variety of functional elements on the map. For example, you can opt to show/hide entity labels, display them above/below the markers, and so on.

attrs.description:
Sets whether a border will be shown around the canvas 

 __Default value__: 0 (the canvas border is hidden)
attrs.name: showCanvasBorder

attrs.description: Sets the color for the canvas border, if the border is shown
attrs.name: canvasBorderColor

attrs.description: Sets the thickness for the canvas border, if the border is shown
attrs.name: canvasBorderThickness

attrs.description: Sets the transparency for the canvas border, if the border is shown
attrs.name: canvasBorderAlpha

attrs.description:
Sets the background color for the map 

 To apply a gradient color background, specify a comma-separated list of the hex color codes to be used
attrs.name: bgColor

attrs.description:
Sets the background transparency 

 To set the transparency for a gradient background, specify a comma-separated list of the transparency value for each color.
attrs.name: bgAlpha

attrs.description: For a gradient backgrouns, sets the ratio of each color constituent.
attrs.name: bgRatio

attrs.description: For a gradient backgrouns, sets the angle of each color constituent.
attrs.name: bgAngle

attrs.description: Sets an image as the map background by taking the path and name of the image as the value
attrs.name: bgImage

attrs.description: Sets the transparency of the background image
attrs.name: bgImageAlpha

attrs.range: stretch, tile, fit, fill, center, none
attrs.description:
Sets the display mode for the background image 

 Acceptable values include: 

 __stretch__: Image is expanded to fit the entire map area, without maintaining original constraints 

 __tile__: Image is repeated as a pattern on the entire map area 

 __fit__: Image is made to fit proportionately on the map area 

 __fill__: Image is made to proportionately fill the entire map area 

 __center__: Image is positioned at the center of the map area 

 __none__: None of the above modes are applied 

 __Default value__: none
attrs.name: bgImageDisplayMode

attrs.description: Sets the vertical alignment of the background image
attrs.name: bgImageVAlign

attrs.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of the background image
attrs.name: bgImageHAlign

attrs.description:
Sets the magnifying scale for the background image 

 This attribute will only work when `bgImageDisplayMode` is set to __none__, __center__, or __tile__.
attrs.name: bgImageScale

attrs.description: Sets the path to load external logo (image file) on the map
attrs.name: logoURL

attrs.description:
Sets the logo position 

 Acceptable values include: __TL__ (top-left), __TR__ (top-right), __BL__ (bottom-left), __BR__ (bottom-right), __CC__ (center of the screen)
attrs.name: logoPosition

attrs.description: Sets the logo transparency
attrs.name: logoAlpha

attrs.description: Sets the magnifying scale for the logo
attrs.name: logoScale

attrs.description: Links the logo to an external URL, specify the link in this attribute. The link can be in FusionCharts Link Format, allowing you to link to new windows, pop-ups, frames etc.
attrs.name: logoLink

description: The following attributes let you configure map cosmetics like background color, background alpha etc.

attrs.description:
Sets whether the entity borders will be shown or hidden 

 __Default value__: 1 (the borders are shown)
attrs.name: showBorder

attrs.description: Sets the border color for map entities
attrs.name: borderColor

attrs.description: Sets the border transparency for map entities
attrs.name: borderAlpha

attrs.description: Sets the default fill color for the entities, if no color range has been specified
attrs.name: fillColor

attrs.description: Sets the transparency for the fill color of the entities
attrs.name: fillAlpha

attrs.description: Sets whether the entities will be rendered in a different color—specified using the `hoverColor` attribute—when the mouse pointer is hovered over them
attrs.name: useHoverColor

attrs.description: Sets the color that will be applied to an entity when the mouse pointer is hovered over it
attrs.name: hoverColor

attrs.description: Sets a default color for enities that are not assigned any value in the map data
attrs.name: nullEntityColor

attrs.description: Sets a default transparency for enities that are not assigned any value in the map data
attrs.name: nullEntityAlpha

attrs.description:
Sets whether the tooltip for the entities will be shown or hidden 

 __Default value__: 1 (the tooltip is shown)
attrs.name: showEntityToolTip

attrs.description: Specifies the color of the static label connector. This attribute is used when you want to explicitly define the color of the label connector. If not set, the label connector color is taken from connectorColor attribute.
attrs.name: labelConnectorColor

attrs.description: Specifies the transparency of the static label connector. This attribute is used when you want to explicitly define the transparency of the label connector. If not set, the label connector alpha is taken from connectorAlpha attribute.
attrs.name: labelConnectorAlpha

description: These attributes let you configure how your entities will appear on the map.

attrs.description:
Sets whether the numbers displayed on the map will be formatted using commas 

 For example, when `formatNumber` is set to __1__, the number will be rendered as 40,000; when `formatNumber` is set to __0__, it will be rendered as 40000.
attrs.name: formatNumber

attrs.description: Sets the number of decimal places to which all numbers on the map will be rounded to.
attrs.name: decimals

attrs.description:
Sets whether zero padding will be forced for decimal numbers 

 For example, if you limit the maximum number of digits after the decimal point  to 2, a number like 55.344 will be rounded to 55.34. This does not mean that all numbers will be displayed with a fixed number of decimal places. For instance 55 will not be displayed as 55.00 and 55.1 will not become 55.10. To have fixed number of decimal places attached to all the numbers, set this attribute to 1.
attrs.name: forceDecimals

attrs.description:
Sets a prefix for the numbers on the map 

 For example, to represent all dollars figure on the map, set this attribute to __$__. The numbers will then be rendered as $40000, $50000. 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: numberPrefix

attrs.description:
Sets a suffix for the numbers on the map 

 For example, to represent all numbers quantified as per annum, set this attribute to ' /a'. The numbers will then be rendered as 40000/a, 50000/a and so on. 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: numberSuffix

attrs.description:
Sets the character to be used as the decimal separator for the numbers on the map 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: decimalSeparator

attrs.description:
Sets the character to be used as the thousand separator for the numbers on the map 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: thousandSeparator

attrs.description:
Sets the number of digits after which the thousand separator should be positioned 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: thousandSeparatorPosition

attrs.description:
In some countries, commas are used as decimal separators and dots as thousand separators. If your chart data is in XML andyou specify such values, it returns an error while converting to number. So, FusionMaps XT accepts the input decimal and thousand separator from user, so that it can convert it accordingly into the required format. This attribute lets you input the decimal separator. 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: inDecimalSeparator

attrs.description:
In some countries, commas are used as decimal separators and dots as thousand separators. If your chart data is in XML andyou specify such values, it returns an error while converting to number. So, FusionMaps XT accepts the input decimal and thousand separator from user, so that it can convert it accordingly into the required format. This attribute lets you input the decimal separator. 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: inThousandSeparator

attrs.description:
Sets whether the suffix __K__ (for thousands) and __M__ (for millions) will be added to a number after it is truncated and rounded off. 

 For example, when `formatNumberScale` is set to __1__, the number 1043 will be rendered as 1.04K (assuming `decimals` is set to __2__). 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: formatNumberScale

attrs.description:
Sets the default unit of the numbers on the map 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: defaultNumberScale

attrs.description:
Sets the unit for each block of the number scale 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: numberScaleUnit

attrs.description:
Sets the range for each block on the number scale 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: numberScaleValue

attrs.description:
Sets whether recursive scaling will be enabled for the numbers on the map 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: scaleRecursively

attrs.description:
Sets the number of recursions to complete during recusrive scaling 

 Setting this attribute to __1__ completes the entire set of recursion 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: maxScaleRecursion

attrs.description:
Sets the separator character for the scales generated after recursion 

 Click [here](/exporting-charts/using-fc-export-server/exporting-charts-as-image-and-pdf) for more information.
attrs.name: scaleSeparator

attrs.description: Sets whether the legend will be shown or hidden
attrs.name: showLegend

attrs.description:
Sets whether legend interaction will be enabled or disbaled 

 Entities can be shown or hidden from the map by clicking the associated legend item.
attrs.name: interactiveLegend

attrs.description:
Sets whether the legend can be made dragable 

 Setting this attribute to __1__ enables dragging the legend anywhere around the chart. 

 __Default value__: 0 

 __Note__: This attribute does not refer to the dragable sliders on a gradient legend, but to the complete legend.
attrs.name: legendAllowDrag

attrs.description: Sets the legend caption
attrs.name: legendCaption

attrs.description: You can reverse the ordering of the legend items in the legend by setting this attribute to 1.
attrs.name: reverseLegend

attrs.description:
Positions the legend to render below the map or to the right of the map 

 __Default value__: BOTTOM
attrs.name: legendPosition

attrs.description:
Sets the magnifying scale for the legend icons 

 __Default value__: 1
attrs.name: legendIconScale

attrs.description: Sets whether the shadow effect will be applied to the legend
attrs.name: legendShadow

attrs.description: Sets the legend background color
attrs.name: legendBgColor

attrs.description: Sets the legend background transparency
attrs.name: legendBgAlpha

attrs.description: Sets the legend border color
attrs.name: legendBorderColor

attrs.description: Sets the legend border thickness
attrs.name: legendBorderThickness

attrs.description: Sets the legend border transparency
attrs.name: legendBorderAlpha

attrs.description:
Sets the legend scroll bar background color 

 A scroll bar is rendered in the legend if there are too many legend items.
attrs.name: legendScrollBgColor

attrs.description:
Sets the legend scroll bar color 

 A scroll bar is rendered in the legend if there are too many legend items.
attrs.name: legendScrollBarColor

attrs.description:
Sets the color for the legend scroll bar buttons 

 A scroll bar is rendered in the legend if there are too many legend items.
attrs.name: legendScrollBtnColor

attrs.description: Sets the gradient legend pointer color
attrs.name: legendPointerColor

attrs.description: Sets the gradient legend pointer transparency
attrs.name: legendPointerAlpha

attrs.description: Sets the gradient legend pointer border thickness
attrs.name: legendPointerBorderThickness

attrs.description: Sets the gradient legend pointer border transparency
attrs.name: legendPointerBorderAlpha

attrs.description: Sets the gradient legend pointer border color
attrs.name: legendPointerBorderColor

attrs.description: Sets the color of the line showing the gradient legend numeric scale
attrs.name: legendScaleLineColor

attrs.description: Sets the opacity of the line showing the gradient legend numeric scale
attrs.name: legendScaleLineAlpha

attrs.description: Sets the thickness of the line showing the gradient legend numeric scale
attrs.name: legendScaleLineThickness

description: If you've defined color ranges, the color range names appear in a legend. The following attributes let you customize the functional and cosmetic properties for the legend such as the legend position, legend border color, and so on.

attrs.description: Numeric value of the <entity>.
attrs.name: value

attrs.description: If you want to display your custom value for each entity (apart from it's long name, short name or value), you can specify it here.
attrs.name: displayValue

attrs.description: Lets you specify a custom tool text for the entity.
attrs.name: toolText

attrs.description: Lets you specify a custom color for the entity. If color range is defined, each entity takes its color from the range it belongs to. However, if you need to force a color for an entity (over-riding the range value), you can specify the hex color code here.
attrs.name: color

attrs.description: Custom alpha (transparency) for the entity
attrs.name: alpha

attrs.description: If you want to link the entity to a URL, you can specify the URL in FusionCharts format. The link can open in same window, new window, pop-up, frames or as JavaScript functions.Please see the section `Drill Down Maps` to learn more about this.
attrs.name: link

attrs.description: If you want the label of this particular entity to appear in a different font (other from the one defined in STYLES/map element), specify the font face here.
attrs.name: font

attrs.description: If you want the label of this particular entity to appear in a different font size (other from the one defined in STYLES/map element), specify the font size here.
attrs.name: fontSize

attrs.description: If you want the label of this particular entity to appear in a different font color (other from the one defined in STYLES/map element), specify the font color here.
attrs.name: fontColor

attrs.description: If you want the label of this particular entity to appear bold (other from the one defined in STYLES/map element), set this as 1.
attrs.name: fontBold

attrs.description: Whether to show the label for this entity? This attribute over-rides the value specified for showLabels attribute for <map> element.
attrs.name: showLabel

attrs.description: Whether to show tooltip for the entity. Default value is 1.
attrs.name: showToolTip

attrs.description: Sets a color to the label connector line (if any).
attrs.name: labelConnectorColor

attrs.description: Specifies the transparency of the label connector line (if any).
attrs.name: labelConnectorAlpha

attrs.description: Whether to show hover color when user hovers mouse over entity. Set this attribute to 0 to disable hover color.
attrs.name: useHoverColor

description: The data object is used to create entities for the map.

attrs.description: Whether to show tool tip on map? When this attribute is set to 0, all the tooltips including entity tooltips, marker toolitps and connector tooltips are disabled.
attrs.name: showToolTip

attrs.description: Background Color for tool tip.
attrs.name: toolTipBgColor

attrs.description: Border Color for tool tip.
attrs.name: toolTipBorderColor

attrs.description: The character specified as the value of this attribute separates the name and value displayed in tool tip.
attrs.name: toolTipSepChar

attrs.description: Whether to show shadow for tool-tips on the map.
attrs.name: showToolTipShadow

description: These attributes let you control the tool tip. You can set the background color, border color, separator character and few other details.

attrs.description: This attribute lets you set the font face (family) of all the text (data labels, values etc.) on map.
attrs.name: baseFont

attrs.description: This attribute sets the base font size of the map i.e., all the values and the names in the map which lie on the canvas will be displayed using the font size provided here.
attrs.name: baseFontSize

attrs.description: This attribute sets the base font color of the map i.e., all the values and the names in the map which lie on the canvas will be displayed using the font color provided here.
attrs.name: baseFontColor

description: Using the attributes below, you can define the generic font properties for the text on the map.

attrs.description: Padding of legend from right/bottom side of map
attrs.name: legendPadding

attrs.description: Amount of empty space that you want to put on the left side of your map. Nothing is rendered in this space.
attrs.name: chartLeftMargin

attrs.description: Amount of empty space that you want to put on the right side of your map. Nothing is rendered in this space.
attrs.name: chartRightMargin

attrs.description: Amount of empty space that you want to put on the top of your map. Nothing is rendered in this space.
attrs.name: chartTopMargin

attrs.description: Amount of empty space that you want to put on the bottom of your map. Nothing is rendered in this space. Ensure the value is set higher than 5px; otherwise, the trial watermark and legend will overlap.
attrs.name: chartBottomMargin

description: The following attributes help you control map margins and paddings.

table: Attributes to allow exporting of map as image, PDF, SVG, or XLSX

attrs.description:
Whether the map will allow exporting to images, PDFs, SVG or XLSX.  

__Default value__: 0
attrs.name: exportEnabled

attrs.description:
In case of server-side exporting, the action specifies whether the exported image will be sent back to client as download, or whether it'll be saved on the server. 

__Default value__: download
attrs.name: exportAction

attrs.description: In case of server side exporting, this refers to the path of the server-side export handler (the ready-to-use scripts that we provide).
attrs.name: exportHandler

attrs.description: Lets you configure what output formats to allow for export of map, in the export context menu, and also customize the label for each menu item. The attribute value should be a pipe (|) delimited separated key-value pair. Example: exportFormats: `PNG=Export as High Quality Image|JPG|PDF=Export as PDF File`
attrs.name: exportFormats

attrs.description:
This attribute when set to __1__, enables the client-side export feature.  

__Default value__: 0
attrs.name: exportAtClientSide

attrs.description: Whether the menu items related to export (e.g., Save as JPEG etc.) will appear in the context menu of map.
attrs.name: exportShowMenuItem

attrs.description:
In case of server-side exporting and when using download as action, this lefts you configure whether the return image, PDF, SVG or XLSX will open in same window (as an attachment for download), or whether it will open in a new window. 

__Default value__: _self
attrs.name: exportTargetWindow

attrs.description: Using this attribute you can specify the name (excluding the extension) of the output (export) file.
attrs.name: exportFileName

description: These attributes allow you to control the saving of map as image.

attrs.description: This attribute sets the font face for all the defined marker labels. You can over-ride this using STYLES.
attrs.name: markerFont

attrs.description: This attribute sets the font size for all the defined marker labels on the map. You can over-ride this using STYLES.
attrs.name: markerFontSize

attrs.description: This attribute sets the font color for all the defined marker labels on the map. You can over-ride this using STYLES.
attrs.name: markerFontColor

attrs.description: Whether to show tool tips for the defined markers?
attrs.name: showMarkerToolTip

attrs.description: You can opt to show/hide label for all the markers on the map using this attribute.
attrs.name: showMarkerLabels

attrs.description: This attribute lets you set a global label padding between the marker icon and its label. You can later over-ride the label padding for each individual marker too.
attrs.name: markerLabelPadding

attrs.description: This attribute lets you set a common background color for all the defined markers on the map. You can later over-ride individual marker colors by using SHAPE definitions.
attrs.name: markerBgColor

attrs.description: This attribute lets you set a common border color for all the defined markers on the map. You can later over-ride individual marker border colors by using SHAPE definitions.
attrs.name: markerBorderColor

attrs.description: This attribute lets you set a common radius for all the defined markers on the map. You can later over-ride individual marker border colors by using SHAPE definitions.
attrs.name: markerRadius

attrs.description: Sets the color of the marker connectors. Also, if labelConnectorColor is not set in XML/JSON data, the same color is applied to the label connector lines (if any) on the map.
attrs.name: connectorColor

attrs.description: Sets the opacity of the marker connectors. Also, if labelConnectorAlpha is not set in XML/JSON data, the same opacity is applied to the label connector lines (if any) on the map.
attrs.name: connectorAlpha

attrs.description: Lets you enable hover effect for this specific entity
attrs.name: showHoverEffect

attrs.description: Fll color for this specific marker on hover
attrs.name: fillHoverColor

attrs.description: Alpha for this specific marker on hover
attrs.name: fillHoverAlpha

attrs.description: Fill ratio for this specific marker on hover
attrs.name: fillHoverRatio

attrs.description: Fill angle for this specific marker on hover
attrs.name: fillHoverAngle

attrs.description: Border thickness for this specific marker on hover
attrs.name: borderHoverThickness

attrs.description: Border color for this specific marker on hover
attrs.name: borderHoverColor

attrs.description: Border alpha for this specific marker on hover
attrs.name: borderHoverAlpha

attrs.description: Sets the color of the marker connectors.This attribute is deprecated. Use connectorColor instead.
attrs.name: markerConnColor - deprecated

attrs.description: Sets the opacity of the marker connectorsThis attribute is deprecated. Use connectorAlpha instead.
attrs.name: markerConnAlpha - deprecated

attrs.description: If you've defined any marker connectors, this attribute lets you set the thickness of all those connectors.
attrs.name: connectorThickness or markerConnThickness - deprecated

attrs.description: Whether to show or hide tooltip for all marker connectors present in a map. The default value is 1.
attrs.name: showConnectorToolTip

attrs.description: Whether the marker connector line should appear as dashed?
attrs.name: connectorDashed or markerConnDashed - deprecated

attrs.description: If marker connector line is to appear as dash, this attribute lets you set the dash length of each part of dash.
attrs.name: connectorDashLen or markerConnDashLen - deprecated

attrs.description: If marker connector line is to appear as dash, this attribute lets you set the dash gap of each part of dash.
attrs.name: connectorDashGap or markerConnDashGap - deprecated

attrs.description: This attribute lets you to scale the markers automatically with respect to the map dimensions. By default, this attribute is set to 0.
attrs.name: autoScaleMarkers

attrs.description: Using this attribute, you can specify the fill color for the marker shape (hex color code without #). If you specify a comma separated list of hex color codes (without #), FusionMaps XT will use those colors to form a gradient.
attrs.name: markerFillColor

attrs.description: Used to specify the fill alpha. In case of gradients, you'll need to specify a comma separated list of alpha.
attrs.name: markerFillAlpha

attrs.description: If you're using gradient fills for the marker, this attribute lets you set the ratio (on a scale of 0-100) for the gradient component colors.
attrs.name: markerFillRatio

attrs.description: If you're using gradient fills for the marker, this attribute lets you set the angle for the gradient.
attrs.name: markerFillAngle

attrs.description: Border alpha for the marker shape.
attrs.name: markerBorderAlpha

description: FusionMaps XT allows user-defined markers on the map. Markers are custom defined points on the map, which help you pin-point locations like cities, houses, malls, junctions etc. Using the properties listed below, you can configure the various aspects of the markers.

table: The definition object (child of the markers object)

attrs.description: Unique ID for the zone
attrs.name: id

attrs.description: Using this attribute, you can set the shape that this marker will assume on the map already defined.
attrs.name: shapeId

attrs.description: Relative X-position of the marker.
attrs.name: x

attrs.description: Relative Y-position of the marker.
attrs.name: y

attrs.description: You can over-ride the labels for each marker during its application. This label will over-ride the label specified during definition.
attrs.name: label

attrs.description: Like label, you can also over-ride the label position for each marker during its application.
attrs.name: labelPos

attrs.description: If you need to provide custom tool text for a marker, you can do so using this attribute.
attrs.name: toolText

attrs.description: If you need your marker to link to other pages, when clicked, define the link here. The link can open in same window, new window, pop-up, frames, throw events etc. Please see `Drill Down Maps` section for more information on link format.
attrs.name: link

attrs.description: If you're using the same shape (shapeId) to represent multiple markers on the map, you can have them differ in size using this attribute. This attributes set the scaling of a particular marker. Valid values are floating numbers between 0 and 5.
attrs.name: scale

attrs.description: In case of arc, circle or polygon, this attribute lets you set the radius of the same. The value of the radius attribute in <shape> element overrides the value of this attribute.
attrs.name: radius

description: The `markers` object is used to define and apply markers to a map. The `definition` object is used to define the zones on the map within which the markers will be placed.

table: The application object (child of the markers object)

attrs.description: ID that matches the marker application to its definition. If you specify an ID which has not been defined previously, you'll see an error in the debug window.
attrs.name: id

attrs.description: Using this attribute, you can set the shape that this marker will assume on the map. FusionMaps XT offers 4 default shapes - circle, arc, triangle or diamond. You can also define your custom shapes and then refer to those.
attrs.name: shapeId

attrs.description: You can over-ride the labels for each marker during its application. This label will over-ride the label specified during definition.
attrs.name: label

attrs.description: Like label, you can also over-ride the label position for each marker during its application.
attrs.name: labelPos

attrs.description: If you need to provide custom tool text for a marker, you can do so using this attribute.
attrs.name: toolText

attrs.description: If you need your marker to link to other pages, when clicked, define the link here. The link can open in same window, new window, pop-up, frames, throw events etc. Please see "Drill Down Maps" section for more information on link format.
attrs.name: link

attrs.description: If you're using the same shape (shapeId) to represent multiple markers on the map, you can have them differ in size using this attribute. This attributes set the scaling of a particular marker. Valid values are floating numbers between 0 and 5.
attrs.name: scale

description: The `markers` object is used to define and apply markers to a map. The `application` object is used to map markers shapes to zones on the map.

table: The shapes object (child of the markers object)

attrs.description: Each shape needs to be given a unique Id. During application, you'll directly refer to the ID of each shape to plot it on the map.
attrs.name: id

attrs.description: type specifies what kind of shape the marker will draw as. Valid values are circle, arc, polygon or image. So, if you want to create a pentagon, select polygon for this attribute and then later set sides to 5.
attrs.name: type

attrs.description: If you're using an image marker shape, you necessarily need to specify it's URL. FusionMaps XT can load GIF, JPEG and PNG files from the same sub-domain only (owing to cross browser security restrictions).
attrs.name: url

attrs.description: If you've opted to plot a polygon shaped marker, you can specify the number of sides the polygon will have, using this attribute. Valid values are 3-20.
attrs.name: sides

attrs.description: This attribute lets you configure the alpha of the entire marker.
attrs.name: alpha

attrs.description: This attribute lets you set the distance (in pixels) between your marker shape and the marker label.
attrs.name: labelPadding

attrs.description: Using this attribute, you can specify the fill color for the marker shape (hex color code without #). If you specify a comma separated list of hex color codes (without #), FusionMaps XT will use those colors to form a gradient.
attrs.name: fillColor

attrs.description: Used to specify the fill alpha. In case of gradients, you'll need to specify a comma separated list of alpha.
attrs.name: fillAlpha

attrs.description: If you're using gradient fills for the marker, this attribute lets you set the ratio (on a scale of 0-100) for the gradient component colors.
attrs.name: fillRatio

attrs.description: If you're using gradient fills for the marker, this attribute lets you set the angle for the gradient.
attrs.name: fillAngle

attrs.description: If you're using gradient fills for the marker, this attribute lets you set the pattern for gradient - valid values are `linear` or `radial`.
attrs.name: fillPattern

attrs.description: Whether to show border for the marker shape?
attrs.name: showBorder

attrs.description: Border color for the marker shape.
attrs.name: borderColor

attrs.description: Border thickness for the marker shape.
attrs.name: borderThickness

attrs.description: Border alpha for the marker shape.
attrs.name: borderAlpha

attrs.description: In case of arc, circle or polygon, this attribute lets you set the radius of the same.
attrs.name: radius

attrs.description: In case of arc, this attribute lets you set the inner radius of the same.
attrs.name: innerRadius

attrs.description: In case of arc or polygon, this attribute lets you set the starting draw angle.
attrs.name: startAngle

attrs.description: In case of arc, this attribute lets you set the ending draw angle.
attrs.name: endAngle

attrs.description: This attribute lets you dynamically re-scale the x-scale of your images after they've been loaded. Valid range is 0-1000.
attrs.name: xScale

attrs.description: This attribute lets you dynamically re-scale the y-scale of your images after they've been loaded. Valid range is 0-1000.
attrs.name: yScale

attrs.description: When using an image marker, you can specify how the image will vertically align with respect to the marker's y position using this attribute. Valid values are `top`, `middle` and `bottom`. For markers which are simple icons, you can use the middle vertical align. In that case, the image will vertically be at the center position of the marker. However, if you've an image icon like a pin-point or a needle with its pointer faced downwards, you'll need to set the vertical alignment position to `top`, so that the pointer exactly points to the given marker location. Horizontally, the images are always aligned centrally.
attrs.name: vAlign

description: The `markers` object is used to define and apply markers to a map. The `shapes` object is used to define the shapes that will be applied as markers.

table: The connectors object (child of the markers object)

attrs.description: Id of the marker from where the connector will start.
attrs.name: from

attrs.description: Id of the marker where the connector will end.
attrs.name: to

attrs.description: Each connector can also link to an external URL. For this attribute, you can specify the link for the connector in FusionCharts Link format.
attrs.name: link

attrs.description: Each connector can have a visible text label. This attribute lets you set the text.
attrs.name: label

attrs.description: If you want to set a custom tool text for the connectors, this attribute lets you do so.
attrs.name: toolText

attrs.description: Thickness of the connector line.
attrs.name: thickness

attrs.description: Color of the connector line.
attrs.name: color

attrs.description: Alpha (transparency) of the connector line.
attrs.name: alpha

attrs.description: Whether the connector line should appear as dashed?
attrs.name: dashed

attrs.description: If the connector line is to appear as dashed, this attribute defines the length of each dashed line.
attrs.name: dashLen

attrs.description: If the connector line is to appear as dashed, this attribute defines the gap between each dashed line.
attrs.name: dashGap

attrs.description: Lets you enable hover effect for this specific connector
attrs.name: showHoverEffect

attrs.description: Color for this specific connector on hover
attrs.name: hoverColor

attrs.description: Alpha for this specific connector on hover
attrs.name: hoverAlpha

attrs.description: Border thickness for this specific connector on hover
attrs.name: hoverThickness

attrs.description: Whether to show tooltip for the connector. Default value is 1.
attrs.name: showToolTip

description: The `markers` object is used to define and apply markers to a map. The `connectors` object is used to draw connectors to connect markers to other markers or marker labels.

attrs.description: The internal and default ID of any entity of the map.
attrs.name: internalId

attrs.description: The new ID of any entity of the map which overrides the internal ID.
attrs.name: newId

attrs.description: The short descriptive name of an entity.
attrs.name: sName

attrs.description: The long descriptive name of an entity.
attrs.name: lName

attrs.description: Lets you enable hover effect for this specific entity
attrs.name: showHoverEffect

attrs.description: Sets the value for maginifying an entity's border when the entity is hovered upon
attrs.name: entityBorderHoverThickness

attrs.description: Fill color for the specific entity on hover
attrs.name: fillHoverColor

attrs.description: Alpha for the specific entity on hover
attrs.name: fillHoverAlpha

attrs.description: If hover color is defined as a gradient using, this attribute lets you specify the distribution of those colors in a ratio that should sum to 100
attrs.name: fillHoverRatio

attrs.description: Fill angle for the specific entity on hover
attrs.name: fillHoverAngle

description: FusionMaps XT allows you to redefine the ID, short name, and long name of an entity, using the `entityDef` object. This object contains the following attributes:

attrs.description: Whether to show Gradient Legend. Default value is 0.
attrs.name: gradient

attrs.description: Sets the minimum value or the lower limit of the numeric range and Gradient Legend.
attrs.name: minValue

attrs.description: Specifies the starting color of the lower limit of Gradient Legend.
attrs.name: code

attrs.description: Starting opacity of Gradient Legend. Default value is 100.
attrs.name: alpha

attrs.description: Specifies the label for the lower limit of Gradient Legend.
attrs.name: startLabel

attrs.description: Specifies the label for the upper limit of Gradient Legend.
attrs.name: endLabel

description: The `colorRange` object is used to define ranges for categorizing entities on a map based on their data values. This object contains the attributes to define the range scale. __Note__: The `colorRange` object is not used to collectively configure all ranges; the `color` object (child of the `colorRange` object) is used to do that.

table: The color object (child of the `colorRange` object)

attrs.description: Lower limit of range.
attrs.name: minValue

attrs.description: Upper limit of range.
attrs.name: maxValue

attrs.description: Text representation of range (to be shown in legend).
attrs.name: displayValue

attrs.description: Hex color code (without #) for the range.
attrs.name: code

attrs.description: Transparency (0-100) for the entities belonging to that range.
attrs.name: alpha

description: The `color` object is used to define individual ranges using the following attributes:

attrs.description: Lets you enable hover effect for entities and markers in the map
attrs.name: showHoverEffect

attrs.description: Lets you enable hover effect just for entities on the map
attrs.name: showEntityHoverEffect

attrs.description: Specifies the fill color for a map entity  on hover
attrs.name: entityFillHoverColor

attrs.description: Specifies the alpha for a map entity on hover
attrs.name: entityFillHoverAlpha

attrs.description: Specifies the fill ratio for an map entity on hover
attrs.name: entityFillHoverRatio

attrs.description: Specifies the fill angle for a map entity on hover
attrs.name: entityFillHoverAngle

attrs.description: Specifies the fill color for a map marker on hover
attrs.name: markerFillHoverColor

attrs.description: Specifies the fill alpha for a map marker on hover
attrs.name: markerFillHoverAlpha

attrs.description: Specifies the fill angle for a map marker on hover
attrs.name: markerFillHoverAngle

attrs.description: Specifies the fill ratio for a map marker on hover
attrs.name: markerFillHoverRatio

attrs.description: Specifies the border thickness for a map marker on hover
attrs.name: markerBorderHoverThickness

attrs.description: Specifies the border color for a map marker on hover
attrs.name: markerBorderHoverColor

attrs.description: Specifies the border alpha for a map marker on hover
attrs.name: markerBorderHoverAlpha

attrs.description: Specifies the fill color for a map connector on hover
attrs.name: connectorHoverColor

attrs.description: Specifies the border thickness for a map connector on hover
attrs.name: connectorHoverThickness

attrs.description: Specifies the border alpha for a map connector on hover
attrs.name: connectorHoverAlpha

description: The hover effect attributes let you customize the resultant effect on the entities when the mouse pointer is hovered over them.
